Reviews.Title: “Great vacations in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Stan_ru
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 5 nights friends 7 pax location 50 meters walk istiklal caddesi close taksim square hotel organized transfer airport easy book try choose upper noise night disco especially weekends breakfast simple kitchen friendly staff free wifi goog value money time stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Will be staying again!”
Reviews.Author: Fireland93
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 7 nights april travelled spending time istanbul fun couple minutes istiklal caddesi close taxim square location read reviews site istanbul stayed upper floor noise wasnt bothering breakfast friendly staff free wifi makes life hotel

Reviews.Title: “I Found there all i need - excellent”

Reviews.Content: stayed february 2010 hotel month excellent hotal stay excellent location shopping night life transportation comfotable comfortable clean beds stuff freindly willing serve quickly price compared hotel range location

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”

Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights price absolutely reasonable convenient location 5 minutes walk havas airport shuttle station taksim save taxi clean shape breakfast 4 5 hotels istanbul manager takes care guests highly recommend hotel eveyone

Reviews.Title: “excellent hotel”

Reviews.Content: nice beautiful bathrooms lot design service friendly personal staff incredibly nice location close istiklal taxim location brings noise light sleepers aware loud music resonates night weekends weekdays difficult fall sleep

Reviews.Title: “everything you needed at the right price -- location, comfort + service”
Reviews.Author: sirtravel
Reviews.Content: spent six nights santa ottoman hotel excellent stayed single euro 80 night inclusive breakfast lovely top floor double bed view onto pedestrian streets line hotel entrance service exceptionally helpful visit enjoyable memory foam mattress pillow dont recall hotel sleep hotel heart taksim square 24 hour activity actually disturbed noise closed window ac slept baby memory foam mattress advantage location heart istanbuls primary night life entertainment bars restaurants literally steps front door easy visit istanbul access modes public transport taksim square

Reviews.Title: “At the heart of Istanbul's day - and night - life”
Reviews.Author: mk13
Reviews.Content: hotel spend days istanbul enjoy liveliness city location couple minutes istiklal caddesi famous pedestrian street town shops cafes restaurants late night maybe located 4th floor noise night life bothering taksim square close buses airports metro historic cable car walking sultanahmet historic heart istanbul hotel clean rich breakfast buffet extremely friendly personnel cook introduced typical breakfast delicacies assistance hotel manager murat reception desk particularly appreciated extra days remain istanbul volcanic ashes unforgettable thank guys

Reviews.Title: “Top value in Istanbul.”

Reviews.Content: inside hotel looks clean clean comfortable hotel offers transit visitors airport welcome drink soft drinks minibar free charge location convenient near taksim square close lots restaurants popular shopping street istiklal easy metro access price expensive planning cash shop instead team staff helpful friendly manager ms absolute delight hotel guests enjoyed dealing stay santa ottoman boutique hotel recommend hotel stay
